remarks: In an ordered ring, multiplication with a positive does not change comparison.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Apr-2018.)
statement:
ornglmullt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. oRing ) $.
ornglmullt.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ornglmullt.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ornglmullt.4 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
orngmulle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` R ) $.
orngmulle.5 $e |- ( ph -> X .<_ Y ) $.
orngmulle.6 $e |- ( ph -> .0. .<_ Z ) $.
orngrmulle $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Z ) .<_ ( Y .x. Z ) ) $.
